snp3.2:425: "Taṁ maṁ padhānapahitattaṁ,nadiṁ nerañjaraṁ pati;Viparakkamma jhāyantaṁ,yogakkhemassa pattiyā.
snp3.2:426: Namucī karuṇaṁ vācaṁ,bhāsamāno upāgami;‘Kiso tvamasi dubbaṇṇo,santike maraṇaṁ tava.
snp3.2:427: Sahassabhāgo maraṇassa,ekaṁso tava jīvitaṁ;Jīva bho jīvitaṁ seyyo,jīvaṁ puññāni kāhasi.
snp3.2:428: Carato ca te brahmacariyaṁ,Aggihuttañca jūhato;Pahūtaṁ cīyate puññaṁ,Kiṁ padhānena kāhasi.
snp3.2:429: Duggo maggo padhānāya,dukkaro durabhisambhavo’";Imā gāthā bhaṇaṁ māro,aṭṭhā buddhassa santike.
snp3.2:430: Taṁ tathāvādinaṁ māraṁ,bhagavā etadabravi;"Pamattabandhu pāpima,yenatthena idhāgato.
snp3.2:431: Aṇumattopi puññena,Attho mayhaṁ na vijjati;Yesañca attho puññena,Te māro vattumarahati.
snp3.2:432: Atthi saddhā tathā viriyaṁ,paññā ca mama vijjati;Evaṁ maṁ pahitattampi,kiṁ jīvamanupucchasi.
snp3.2:433: Nadīnamapi sotāni,ayaṁ vāto visosaye;Kiñca me pahitattassa,lohitaṁ nupasussaye.
snp3.2:434: Lohite sussamānamhi,Pittaṁ semhañca sussati;Maṁsesu khīyamānesu,Bhiyyo cittaṁ pasīdati;Bhiyyo sati ca paññā ca,Samādhi mama tiṭṭhati.
snp3.2:435: Tassa mevaṁ viharato,Pattassuttamavedanaṁ;Kāmesu nāpekkhate cittaṁ,Passa sattassa suddhataṁ.
snp3.2:436: Kāmā te paṭhamā senā,Dutiyā arati vuccati;Tatiyā khuppipāsā te,Catutthī taṇhā pavuccati.
snp3.2:437: Pañcamaṁ thinamiddhaṁ te,Chaṭṭhā bhīrū pavuccati;Sattamī vicikicchā te,Makkho thambho te aṭṭhamo.
snp3.2:438: Lābho siloko sakkāro,Micchāladdho ca yo yaso;Yo cattānaṁ samukkaṁse,Pare ca avajānati.
snp3.2:439: Esā namuci te senā,Kaṇhassābhippahārinī;Na naṁ asūro jināti,Jetvā ca labhate sukhaṁ.
snp3.2:440: Esa muñjaṁ parihare,Dhiratthu mama jīvitaṁ;Saṅgāme me mataṁ seyyo,Yañce jīve parājito.
snp3.2:441: Pagāḷhettha na dissanti,Eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā;Tañca maggaṁ na jānanti,Yena gacchanti subbatā.
snp3.2:442: Samantā dhajiniṁ disvā,Yuttaṁ māraṁ savāhanaṁ;Yuddhāya paccuggacchāmi,Mā maṁ ṭhānā acāvayi.
snp3.2:443: Yaṁ te taṁ nappasahati,Senaṁ loko sadevako;Taṁ te paññāya bhecchāmi,Āmaṁ pattaṁva asmanā.
snp3.2:444: Vasīkaritvā saṅkappaṁ,Satiñca sūpatiṭṭhitaṁ;Raṭṭhā raṭṭhaṁ vicarissaṁ,Sāvake vinayaṁ puthū.
snp3.2:445: Te appamattā pahitattā,Mama sāsanakārakā;Akāmassa te gamissanti,Yattha gantvā na socare".
snp3.2:447: Medavaṇṇaṁva pāsāṇaṁ,Vāyaso anupariyagā;Apettha muduṁ vindema,Api assādanā siyā.
snp3.2:448: Aladdhā tattha assādaṁ,Vāyasetto apakkami;Kākova selamāsajja,Nibbijjāpema gotamaṁ".
snp3.2:449: Tassa sokaparetassa,Vīṇā kacchā abhassatha;Tato so dummano yakkho,Tatthevantaradhāyathāti.
